Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Granville
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Granville due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Granville due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
